titles.title: Endorsing reforms for freedom and democracy in Vietnam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
9/19/2007--Introduced.
Endorses reforms for freedom and democracy in Vietnam, including those reforms advocated by Dr. Nguyen Dan Que's 9-point road map to democracy. Urges the U.S. government to utilize such reforms to peacefully bring democracy and human rights to Vietnam.
